effect.then: One of the characteristics of being humble is having a low sense of entitlement. Humble people don't think they are owed things. This leads to a less prejudiced view of the world, encouraging them to be tolerant to others and less defensive about their own beliefs.
Humble people are, on average, more helpful than people who are conceited or egotistical. This makes our world a better place.
Humble people may have better relationships because they accept other people for who they are. This leads to a more harmonious society.
